author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: يَا إِلَهِي هَذَا عَبْدُكَ وَابْنُ عَبْدِكَ الَّذِي آمَنَ بِكَ وَبِآيَاتِكَ وَتَوَجَّهَ إِلَيْكَ مُنْقَطِعًا عَنْ سِوَاكَ * إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ أَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِينَ *
translation: O my God! This is Thy servant and the son of Thy servant who hath believed in Thee and in Thy signs, and set his face towards Thee, wholly detached from all except Thee. Thou art, verily, of those who show mercy the most merciful.
